answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Elizabeth, 
Unfortunately the Knowledge Network does not contain any such documents at this time. I would encourage you to use the Who's Who function to search for colleagues in college towns and ask them directly if they have a relationships between universities and off-campus food vendors. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/people/whos_who
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Elizabeth Bagwell
text: Do any of you have agreements with off-campus vendors (eg. restaurants) which enable students to use their meal plan to eat off-campus. Any information about such agreements would be welcome.
title: Off-Campus Vendors
